title: I Printed My CV On My Car & Parked It Outside My Dream Job
description: In this video, Max Fosh prints his CV on his car and parks it outside his dream job to try to get noticed by the company.
summary: Max Fosh tries a unique approach to getting a job by printing his CV on his car and parking it outside his dream job.
payoff: The payoff comes when Max's unconventional tactic actually works and he gets noticed by the company, showcasing his creativity and determination.
